alert.note: Alert for Audubon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 4:17AM CDT until March 18 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Heavy Wet Snow Developing This Morning... .Rain will continue to change to snow across the advisory area this morning and persist through the day. Roads will become snow or slush covered at times causing slick conditions to develop. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Locally higher amounts on grassy or elevated surfaces may occur. The wind will gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Audubon County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow or slush covered roadways and slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact this mornings commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org or dial 511.
